summary: Completed multiple critical fixes and enhancements to the BeautyBooking module: (1) Enhanced ranking algorithm by adding cancellation rate (7%) and service type matching (5%) factors, bringing total to 8 factors as per requirements; (2) Fixed Top Rated badge criteria from 4.5 to 4.8 rating minimum; (3) Added missing 'Complete Booking' endpoint for vendors (API and Web) to allow marking bookings as completed; (4) Fixed badge assignment in admin controller to use BeautyBadgeService properly; (5) Added comprehensive translations (English and Persian) for all new endpoints and error messages; (6) Verified existing payment hooks, booking statistics updates, and badge auto-assignment systems are working correctly. All changes follow PSR-12 standards, include bilingual comments, and have no linter errors.
current_status: BeautyBooking module is now significantly more complete with enhanced ranking algorithm (all 8 factors implemented), corrected badge criteria, new booking completion functionality, and comprehensive translations. Core features verified: payment hooks, revenue models, badge system, booking flow, and scheduled commands. Module has 148 PHP files. Ready for final testing and deployment.
